channel.title: Requesting 24/7 Host (PI)
channel.description:
I'm needing a 24/7 hoster for my 317 loading 602 server. I'm getting my computer's hard drive cleaned in a few days and need a host. It needs to be a vps host obviously
The pay? All donations to the server will go to you. I can't guarantee that the server will be an instant success, but it will gain players and donations over time. Donation costs won't be high like corruptionx and not low like spawning servers RS account donations: No unless you want them You will also be a moderator on the server
The source was from a friend and is still being developed. It has many 602 features like Curses (Soulsplit is underway) Korasi (Special on the way) [I know that's not a 602 feature, but the model is there] Colored whips ALL Dungeoneering Armour and Weapons working (Bows are glitchy + maul emotes are incorrect) Chaotics & Gravite Staff of light Spitit shield (The list can go on for a very long time)
I hope you choose to help me. ~Cole

item.title: Requesting 24/7 Host (PI)
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

You cannot request hosts on this site.

Read full topic

item.title: Requesting 24/7 Host (PI)
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

I’m needing a 24/7 hoster for my 317 loading 602 server.
I’m getting my computer’s hard drive cleaned in a few days and need a host.
It needs to be a vps host obviously

The pay? All donations to the server will go to you.
I can’t guarantee that the server will be an instant success, but it will gain players and donations over time.
Donation costs won’t be high like corruptionx and not low like spawning servers
RS account donations: No unless you want them
You will also be a moderator on the server

The source was from a friend and is still being developed.
It has many 602 features like Curses (Soulsplit is underway)
Korasi (Special on the way) [I know that’s not a 602 feature, but the model is there]
Colored whips
ALL Dungeoneering Armour and Weapons working (Bows are glitchy + maul emotes are incorrect)
Chaotics & Gravite
Staff of light
Spitit shield
(The list can go on for a very long time)

I hope you choose to help me.
~Cole
